focusingDistance.description: Focus distance in time unit from the elements surface at the center of the aperture

planeWaveCapturePulserBeamIds.description: Reference to a list of beam identifiers of a plane wave capture formation. Each one is associated to a refracted angle and a list of pulser delays. Path: groups//planeWaveCapture//pulseBeamsFormation//pulseBeams//id

lastCellRewrited.description: When the acquisition has been done in Time mode (no encoder) this axis is a circular buffer in which the first position is given in lastCellRewrited

mountingLocationId.description: The mounting location ID on the wedge, on which the probe is mounted
